analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.sellTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#671-699):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = _value * uint256(10) ** token.decimals() / tokenRateWei (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#687)
	- token.transferByCrowdsale(_recepient,tokensSold) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#694)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _recepient.transfer(refund) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#683)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#697)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#49) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#52-54)

Crowdsale.refund (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#712-729) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFromByCrowdsale(msg.sender,token.forSale(),tokens) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#728)

Crowdsale.sellTokens.refund (local variable @ /../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#681) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.refund (function @ /../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#712-729)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.sellTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#671-699):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = _value * uint256(10) ** token.decimals() / tokenRateWei (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#687)
	External calls sending eth:

	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.sellTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#671-699):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = _value * uint256(10) ** token.decimals() / tokenRateWei (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#687)
	- token.transferByCrowdsale(_recepient,tokensSold) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#694)
	External calls sending eth:

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participants (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#695)
	- participants (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#696)
	- totalSold (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#698)

WithBonusPeriods.updateCurrentBonusPeriod (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#186-198) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- currentBonusPeriod.fromTimestamp <= block.timestamp && currentBonusPeriod.toTimestamp >= block.timestamp (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#187-189)
	- bonusPeriods[i].fromTimestamp <= block.timestamp && bonusPeriods[i].toTimestamp >= block.timestamp (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#194-197)

BasicCrowdsale.start (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#515-545) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_startTimestamp >= block.timestamp) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#528)

BasicCrowdsale.isFailed (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#548-563) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (started && block.timestamp >= endTimestamp && totalCollected < minimalGoal) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#553-562)

BasicCrowdsale.isActive (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#566-582) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (started && totalCollected < hardCap && block.timestamp >= startTimestamp && block.timestamp < endTimestamp) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#571-581)

elements.expression: (started && totalCollected < hardCap && block.timestamp >= startTimestamp && block.timestamp < endTimestamp)

analysis.description:
BasicCrowdsale.isSuccessful (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#585-597) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (totalCollected >= hardCap || (block.timestamp >= endTimestamp && totalCollected >= minimalGoal)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/16884.sol#590-596)
